p: The effect of climate change on pathogen behaviour was investigated in several studies (e.g., Dukes et al. 2009; Sterk et al. 2013; Danovaro et al. 2009; Koelle et al. 2005; Hellberg and Chu 2015). However, these studies mainly focused on foodborne and waterborne pathogens. To our knowledge, the effect of climate change on concentrations of airborne pathogen has not been investigated yet.
